description.value: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.
This three‑pronged, spear‑like weapon typically has a 4‑foot shaft. Like a spear, it can be wielded with one hand or thrown.

Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half‑plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.
Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

Activate A Interact

The head of this bolt is made from gleaming copper.

When an activated storm bolt hits a target, it is buffeted by raging winds and struck by a bolt of lightning that deals [[/r 3d12]] electricity damage and the target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:25|name:Storm Arrow] saving throw.

If this bolt is shot from a weapon with a shock property rune, the save DC increases to 27, though the attack doesn't benefit from the shock property rune itself.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and isn't affected by the wind.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is buffeted by winds for 1 round, taking a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attack rolls and a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its fly Speed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the foe takes double damage.

rules.text: Critical Specialization The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the start of Bharlen Sajor's next turn

Critical Specialization The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Brawling Critical Specialization] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of Bharlen Sajor's next turn

Critical Specialization If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} and must spend an Interact action to attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:10|name:Bow Critical Specialization] check to pull the missile free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), or could otherwise escape without effort.
Critical Specialization The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the start of Bharlen Sajor's next turn

description.value:
Trigger A creature within Bharlen's reach moves away from her

Effect Bharlen Strides up to her Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout this movement.

When Bharlen is destroyed, her armor rebuilds its body over the course of [[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}-or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts.

Bharlen can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating her armor (such as with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Disintegrate]{Disintegrate}), transporting it to the Positive Energy Plane, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Aura]{Aura}

When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, Bharlen automatically attempts to counteract it, with a [[/r 1d20+18 #Counteract]]{+18} counteract modifier.

Bharlen deals an extra [[/r {1d8}]]{1d8 damage} with tridents, and a trident gains the shove trait while she is using it in melee (both the extra damage die and the shove trait have been included in Bharlen's trident Strikes above).

Bharlen unleashes crackling lightning in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|damaging:yes]{30-foot cone}. Creatures in the area take [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12 electricity damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save).

Bharlen can use this ability once every [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:40|traits:curse] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed 1} and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed 2}, all speeds reduced by 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight.

Any weapons Bharlen wields gain the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Weapon Potency (+1)]{+1} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Striking]{Striking} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shock]{Shock} runes.

Bharlen calls to the endless storm to lend murderous power to her blows. She makes a Strike; on a hit, seawater appears in the target's lungs and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 3} on a critical hit).
Bharlen has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapon she wields.
